result.title: Ashgabat2017
result.content:
Hello Codeforces!

I'm glad to announce that on Sep/17/2017 20:17 UTC+5 V Asian Indoor and Martial Art Games (AIMAG) opening ceremony will take place in Ashgabat, Turkmenistan.

This is first the biggest olympiad in my country.

I wish lots of medals to all countries.

Official website: Ashgabat2017

You can watch online here.
